testcase.classname: US004 Login page should accessible only with valid credentials
testcase.name: TC01 There should be a valid username and password validating the success message to login
testcase.system-out: Given The User goes to Medunna URL..........................................passed Then The user navigates the sign in the page................................passed Then The user clicks on the sign-in button..................................passed And The user fills the Username box.........................................passed And The user fills the Password box.........................................passed And The user clicks on the sign-in button below the page....................passed Then The user verifies sign-in is done successfully.........................passed

testcase.classname: US004 Login page should accessible only with valid credentials
testcase.name: TC02 There should be a valid username and password validating the success message to login (Negative Scenario)
testcase.system-out: Given The User goes to Medunna URL..........................................passed Then The user navigates the sign in the page................................passed Then The user clicks on the sign-in button..................................passed And The user fills the Username with a wrong data...........................passed And The user fills the Password box.........................................passed And The user clicks on the sign-in button below the page....................passed Then The user verifies sign-in isn't done successfull.......................passed

testcase.classname: US004 Login page should accessible only with valid credentials
testcase.name: TC03 There should be a "Remember me" option where user can always use their existing credentials
testcase.system-out: Given The User goes to Medunna URL..........................................passed Then The user navigates the sign in the page................................passed Then The user clicks on the sign-in button..................................passed And The user fills the Username box.........................................passed And The user fills the Password box.........................................passed Then The user tests that the remember me button can be clicked..............passed

testcase.classname: US004 Login page should accessible only with valid credentials
testcase.name: TC04 There should be an option to update password if it is forgotten ' Did you forget your password'
testcase.system-out: Given The User goes to Medunna URL..........................................passed Then The user navigates the sign in the page................................passed Then The user clicks on the sign-in button..................................passed Then The user verifies that the phrase of the "Did you forget your password?" exists.passed

testcase.classname: US004 Login page should accessible only with valid credentials
testcase.name: TC05 There should be an option to navigate to registration page if not registered yet
testcase.system-out: Given The User goes to Medunna URL..........................................passed Then The user navigates the sign in the page................................passed Then The user clicks on the sign-in button..................................passed Then The user verifies that the phrase of the "You don't have an account yet? Register a new account" exists.passed

testcase.classname: US004 Login page should accessible only with valid credentials
testcase.name: TC06 There should be an option to cancel login
testcase.system-out: Given The User goes to Medunna URL..........................................passed Then The user navigates the sign in the page................................passed Then The user clicks on the sign-in button..................................passed Then The user verifies that "cancel" button exists on the page..............passed
